name: VERDANT Version: Disk Masters Expansion 1
description:
Blooming flowers eventually fall to rot and ruin…

 

Introducing the first expansion to Disk Masters, it’s VERDANT Version: Disk Masters Expansion 1!

 

Disk Masters is a monster battling/collecting game focused on creating the monsters (called Summons) of your dreams! Summon them in epic matches or collect them to add to your Summon arsenal!

 

In this massive expansion for the original Disk Masters game comes…

 

  • -DOZENS of new Summons
  • -ULTRA SKILLS to add some extra firepower to your monsters
  • -ABILITIES for your Summon that can change the tide of combat!

 

This IS an expansion, but within this beautifully crafted PDF you can find all of the rules for Disk Masters alongside the new information presented!

 

Please leave a review if you would like, and comment below any compliments, complaints, or questions!

 

Enjoy the Gatcha region, Summoners!
